00014 #include "xscheduler.h"
00015  
00016 shared_ptr<XSignalBuffer> g_signalBuffer;
00017 unsigned int g_adaptiveDelay = 20;
00018 
00019 void 
00020 registerTransactionList(_XTransaction *transaction) {
00021     g_signalBuffer->registerTransactionList(transaction);
00022 }
00023 
00024 XSignalBuffer::XSignalBuffer()
00025     : m_oldest_timestamp(timeStamp()) {
00026 }
00027 XSignalBuffer::~XSignalBuffer() {
00028 }
00029 _XTransaction *
00030 XSignalBuffer::popOldest() {
00031     _XTransaction *item = 0L, *skipped_item = 0L;
00032     if(m_queue.size()) {
00033         item = m_queue.front();
00034         if(m_skippedQueue.size()) {
00035             if((long)(m_queue.front()->registered_time - m_skippedQueue.front().second) > 0) {
00036                 skipped_item = m_skippedQueue.front().first;
00037                 item = 0L;
00038             }
00039         }
00040     }
00041     else {
00042         if(m_skippedQueue.size())
00043             skipped_item = m_skippedQueue.front().first;
00044     }
00045     if(item)
00046         m_queue.pop();
00047     if(skipped_item)    
00048         m_skippedQueue.pop_front();
00049     if(m_queue.size()) {
00050         if(m_skippedQueue.size()) {
00051             if((long)(m_queue.front()->registered_time - m_skippedQueue.front().second) > 0)
00052                 m_oldest_timestamp = m_skippedQueue.front().second;
00053             else
00054                 m_oldest_timestamp = m_queue.front()->registered_time;
00055         }
00056         else
00057             m_oldest_timestamp = m_queue.front()->registered_time;
00058     }
00059     else {
00060         if(m_skippedQueue.size())
00061             m_oldest_timestamp = m_skippedQueue.front().second;
00062     }
00063     if(item)
00064         return item;
00065     return skipped_item;
00066 }
00067 void 
00068 XSignalBuffer::registerTransactionList(_XTransaction *transaction)
00069 {
00070     unsigned long time(transaction->registered_time);
00071     ASSERT(!isMainThread());
00072     for(;;) {
00073         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
00074             unsigned long cost = 0;
00075             if(!m_queue.empty()) {
00076                 cost += time - m_oldest_timestamp;
00077             }
00078             if(cost > 100000uL) {
00079                 if(g_adaptiveDelay < 300) {
00080                     atomicInc(&g_adaptiveDelay);
00081                 }
00082             }
00083             if(cost < 10000uL) {
00084                 for(;;) {
00085                     unsigned int delay = g_adaptiveDelay;
00086                     if(delay == 0) break;
00087                     if(atomicCompareAndSet(delay, delay - 1, &g_adaptiveDelay)) {
00088                         break;
00089                     }
00090                 }
00091             }
00092             if(cost < 50000uL) {
00093                 break;
00094             }
00095             msecsleep(std::min(cost * i / 1000000uL, 10uL));
00096             time = timeStamp();
00097         }
00098         try {
00099             bool empty = m_queue.empty();
00100             m_queue.push(transaction);
00101             if(empty) m_oldest_timestamp = transaction->registered_time;
00102             break;
00103         }
00104         catch (Queue::nospace_error &) {
00105             msecsleep(10);
00106         }
00107     }
00108 }
00109 bool
00110 XSignalBuffer::synchronize()
00111 {
00112     bool dotalk = true;
00113     XTime time_start(XTime::now());
00114     unsigned long time_stamp_start(timeStamp());
00115     unsigned long clock_in_ms = 1000;
00116     unsigned int skipped_cnt = 0;
00117   
00118     for(;;) {
00119         if(m_queue.empty() && (m_skippedQueue.size() <= skipped_cnt)) {
00120             dotalk = !m_skippedQueue.empty();
00121             break;
00122         }
00123         _XTransaction *transaction = popOldest();
00124         if(!transaction) {
00125             dotalk = false;
00126             break;
00127         }
00128         bool skip = false;
00129         try {
00130             skip = transaction->talkBuffered();  
00131         }
00132         catch (XKameError &e) {
00133             e.print();
00134         }
00135         catch (std::bad_alloc &) {
00136             gErrPrint("Memory Allocation Failed!");
00137         }
00138         if(skip) {
00139             m_skippedQueue.push_back(std::pair<_XTransaction*, unsigned long>(transaction, timeStamp()));
00140             skipped_cnt++;
00141         }
00142         else {
00143             delete transaction;
00144         }
00145         if((timeStamp() - time_stamp_start) / clock_in_ms > 30uL) break;
00146     }
00147     unsigned int msec = XTime::now().diff_msec(time_start);
00148     if(msec > 10)
00149         clock_in_ms = (timeStamp() - time_stamp_start) / msec;
00150     return !dotalk;
00151 }
